root: ^The reports were graphic, but nothing could have prepared you for your arrival   in the system.
^Orbiting the star are almost a dozen medical vessels, with swarms of small civilian craft surrounding them.
^Almost blotted out completely by the armada is a small orbital refueling plant.

flagshipIntro: ^Almost half an hour passes before the flagship responds, and when they do get back to you it's not with an eagerness to help.
^Emergency patients to Deck 3, everyone else will have to wait a bit longer. No, a cough isn't an emergency.

where: ^So like, what's your deal? What do you do here, vibe-wise?
^I don't have time for this, we have people fighting for their lives here. Go look us up on the extranet if you're so damn curious. "Athena Medical."
aid: ^No, sorry, I'd like to help your efforts here. Are you accepting donations?
^Oh, you want to help? Wow, that's... actually a new one. Sad state of affairs this far out from the Core, but that's how it is. Yeah, we'll take whatever you can afford to give!

b: ^Sending over a pallet of supplies now. Hope this helps!
^Sorry, I can't actually afford to help, nevermind.
^Sending over a few pallets of supplies now. Hope this helps!
^Sorry, I can't actually afford to help, nevermind.

aidSuccess: ^Thank you for your donation. Now I'm sorry, but I have to get back on the line.
aidFail: ^Fine, whatever. Thanks for wasting my time.

refuelingPlant: ^Welcome to Cheap Charlie's Ol' Reliable Super-Luminal Fuel Station & Rest Stop! Warning: this station is automated. How may we serve you today?
